contract is responsible for proposing, executing, and cancelling upgrades for contracts that follow the Transparent Upgradeable Proxy pattern. It includes a timelock mechanism for upgrades and an optional allowlist for approved implementation contracts. It integrates with AccessControl for role-based permissions and is emergency-aware. All administrative actions are governed by roles defined in the AccessControl contract.","errors":{"NotAContract(string)":[{"details":"Thrown when an address is expected to be a contract but is an External-Owned Account (EOA).","params":{"context":"A string describing the context of the error."}}],"NotAuthorized(bytes32)":[{"details":"Thrown when a function is called by an account that does not have the required role.","params":{"requiredRole":"The `bytes32` identifier of the role that is required."}}],"PA_AccessControlZero()":[{"details":"Thrown if the AccessControl address is zero during initialization."}],"PA_AdminChangeFailed(string)":[{"details":"Thrown when a proxy's `changeAdmin` call fails.","params":{"reason":"The revert reason from the proxy call."}}],"PA_CallerNotEC()":[{"details":"Thrown when a function is called by an account other than the EmergencyController."}],"PA_DataEmptyForCall()":[{"details":"Thrown when proposing an `upgradeToAndCall` with empty calldata."}],"PA_ECNotSet()":[{"details":"Thrown when the EmergencyController address is not set but is required."}],"PA_EmergencyControllerZero()":[{"details":"Thrown if the EmergencyController address is zero during initialization."}],"PA_ExecImplNotAContract()":[{"details":"Thrown when a proposed implementation is no longer a contract at the time of execution."}],"PA_GetAdminFailed()":[{"details":"Thrown on a failed call to get a proxy's admin address."}],"PA_GetImplFailed()":[{"details":"Thrown on a failed call to get a proxy's implementation address."}],"PA_ImplAlreadyAdded()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to add an implementation to the allowlist that is already on it."}],"PA_ImplNotAContract()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to add an implementation that is not a contract."}],"PA_ImplNotAdded()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to remove an implementation from the allowlist that was not on it."}],"PA_ImplNotApproved()":[{"details":"Thrown when proposing an upgrade to an implementation that is not on the active allowlist."}],"PA_ImplZero()":[{"details":"Thrown when an implementation address parameter is the zero address."}],"PA_ImplementationNoLongerValidAtExecution()":[{"details":"Thrown if, at execution, the proposed implementation is no longer on the allowlist (if it was verified at proposal time)."}],"PA_InvalidTimelockDuration()":[{"details":"Thrown if the upgrade timelock duration is set to an invalid value."}],"PA_NewAdminZero()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to change a proxy's admin to the zero address."}],"PA_NoProposalExists()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to act on an upgrade proposal that does not exist."}],"PA_NotAuthorizedToCancel()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to cancel an upgrade proposal without the required permissions."}],"PA_ProxyZero()":[{"details":"Thrown when a proxy address parameter is the zero address."}],"PA_TimelockNotYetExpired()":[{"details":"Thrown when trying to execute an upgrade before its timelock has expired."}],"PA_UpgradeFailed(string)":[{"details":"Thrown when a proxy's `upgradeTo` or `upgradeToAndCall` function fails.","params":{"reason":"The revert reason from the proxy call."}}],"PA_UpgradePropExists()":[{"details":"Thrown when an upgrade proposal already exists for a proxy."}],"SystemInEmergencyMode()":[{"details":"Thrown when the global emergency system is active, preventing operations."}],"ZeroAddress(string)":[{"details":"Thrown when an address parameter is the zero address where it is not allowed.","params":{"context":"A string describing the context of the error (e.g., \"initialOwner_\")."}}]},"events":{"EmergencyControllerSet(address,address,address)":{"params":{"newController":"The new controller address.","oldController":"The previous controller address.","setter":"The address that performed the update."}},"EmergencyShutdownHandled(uint8,address)":{"params":{"caller":"The address of the controller that initiated the shutdown signal.","emergencyLevel":"The emergency level that was handled."}},"EmergencyStatusChecked(uint8,bytes4,bool)":{"params":{"allowed":"A boolean indicating whether the operation was allowed to proceed.","emergencyLevel":"The current system-wide emergency level at the time of the check.","operation":"The function selector of the operation being checked."}},"Initialized(uint8)":{"details":"Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized."},"TimelockUpdated(uint256,uint256,address)":{"params":{"newTimelock":"The new timelock duration.","oldTimelock":"The previous timelock duration.","updater":"The address that performed the update."}},"UpgradeCancelled(address,address,address)":{"params":{"canceller":"The address that cancelled the proposal.","implementation":"The implementation address of the cancelled proposal.","proxy":"The address of the proxy whose proposal was cancelled."}},"UpgradeExecuted(address,address,address)":{"params":{"executor":"The address that executed the upgrade.","newImplementation":"The address of the new implementation.","proxy":"The address of the upgraded proxy."}},"UpgradeProposed(address,address,uint256,address)":{"params":{"executeAfter":"The timestamp after which the upgrade can be executed.","newImplementation":"The address of the proposed new implementation.","proposer":"The address that proposed the upgrade.","proxy":"The address of the proxy being upgraded."}},"ValidImplementationAdded(address,address)":{"params":{"adder":"The address that performed the addition.","implementation":"The address added to the allowlist."}},"ValidImplementationRemoved(address,address)":{"params":{"implementation":"The address removed from the allowlist.","remover":"The address that performed the removal."}}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"addValidImplementation(address)":{"params":{"implementationToAdd":"The address of the implementation contract to add."},"returns":{"successFlag":"A boolean indicating if the operation was successful."}},"cancelUpgrade(address)":{"details":"Can be called by the original proposer or any account with `UPGRADER_ROLE` or `PROXY_ADMIN_ROLE`.","params":{"proxy":"The address of the proxy whose upgrade proposal should be cancelled."},"returns":{"successFlag":"A boolean indicating if the operation was successful."}},"changeProxyAdmin(address,address)":{"details":"This should be used with extreme caution, as it transfers control of the proxy away from this ProxyAdmin. Only callable by an account with the `PROXY_ADMIN_ROLE`.","params":{"newAdmin":"The address of the new admin.","proxy":"The address of the proxy contract."}},"checkEmergencyStatus(bytes4)":{"details":"This function is typically called by modifiers within the implementing contract to guard functions.","params":{"operation":"The 4-byte function selector of the operation being attempted."},"returns":{"finalOperationAllowed":"A boolean indicating if the operation is permitted."}},"constructor":{"details":"Disables the regular constructor to make the contract upgradeable."},"emergencyShutdown(uint8)":{"details":"The implementing contract defines how it should react to different emergency levels. For example, it might pause itself or enable emergency withdrawals.","params":{"emergencyLevel":"The system-wide emergency level being broadcast by the controller."},"returns":{"successFlag":"A boolean indicating if the shutdown was handled successfully."}},"executeUpgrade(address)":{"params":{"proxy":"The address of the proxy to upgrade."}},"getEmergencyController()":{"returns":{"controllerAddress":"The address of the EmergencyController."}},"getImplementationCount()":{"returns":{"countValue":"The number of implementations on the allowlist."}},"getProxyAdmin(address)":{"params":{"proxy":"The address of the proxy contract."},"returns":{"adminAddress":"The address of the admin (should be this contract)."}},"getProxyImplementation(address)":{"params":{"proxy":"The address of the proxy contract."},"returns":{"implementationAddress":"The address of the logic contract."}},"getUpgradeProposal(address)":{"params":{"proxy":"The address of the proxy."},"returns":{"canExecOut":"A boolean indicating if the proposal can be executed now.","implOut":"The address of the proposed new implementation.","propTimeOut":"The timestamp of the proposal.","proposerOut":"The address of the proposer.","timeRemOut":"The remaining time in seconds until the timelock expires.","verifiedOut":"A boolean indicating if the implementation was on the allowlist at proposal time."}},"initialize(address,address,uint256,address)":{"details":"Sets up initial contract addresses and the upgrade timelock. Can only be called once.","params":{"accessControlAddress_":"The address of the AccessControl contract.","emergencyControllerAddress_":"The address of the EmergencyController contract.","initialAdmin_":"The address to be granted the initial PROXY_ADMIN_ROLE.","timelockDuration_":"The initial timelock duration for upgrades, in seconds."}},"isEmergencyPaused()":{"returns":{"isEffectivelyPaused":"A boolean indicating if the contract is considered to be in a paused state."}},"proposeUpgrade(address,address)":{"details":"Creates a timelocked proposal. If an implementation allowlist is active, the target must be on it.","params":{"newImplementationProposed":"The address of the new implementation contract.","proxy":"The address of the proxy to upgrade."}},"proposeUpgradeAndCall(address,address,bytes)":{"details":"Creates a timelocked proposal. `data` typically contains the function selector and arguments for an initializer.","params":{"data":"The calldata to be executed in the context of the proxy after the upgrade.","newImplementationProposed":"The address of the new implementation contract.","proxy":"The address of the proxy to upgrade."}},"removeValidImplementation(address)":{"params":{"implementationToRemove":"The address of the implementation contract to remove."},"returns":{"successFlag":"A boolean indicating if the operation was successful."}},"setEmergencyController(address)":{"details":"Only callable by an account with the `PROXY_ADMIN_ROLE`.","params":{"controller":"The address of the new EmergencyController."},"returns":{"successFlag":"A boolean indicating if the operation was successful."}},"updateTimelock(uint256)":{"details":"Only callable by an account with the `PROXY_ADMIN_ROLE`.","params":{"newTimelock":"The new timelock duration in seconds."}}},"title":"ProxyAdmin","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"EmergencyControllerSet(address,address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the EmergencyController address is changed."},"EmergencyShutdownHandled(uint8,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a contract has processed an `emergencyShutdown` signal from the controller."},"EmergencyStatusChecked(uint8,bytes4,bool)":{"notice":"Emitted when an emergency status check is performed."},"TimelockUpdated(uint256,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when the upgrade timelock duration is updated."},"UpgradeCancelled(address,address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a pending upgrade proposal is cancelled."},"UpgradeExecuted(address,address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a proposed upgrade is successfully executed."},"UpgradeProposed(address,address,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a new upgrade is proposed for a proxy."},"ValidImplementationAdded(address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a new implementation address is added to the allowlist."},"ValidImplementationRemoved(address,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when an implementation address is removed from the allowlist."}},"kind":"user","methods":{"accessControl()":{"notice":"The contract that controls roles and permissions."},"addValidImplementation(address)":{"notice":"Adds an implementation contract address to the allowlist of valid upgrade targets."},"cancelUpgrade(address)":{"notice":"Cancels a pending upgrade proposal for a proxy."},"changeProxyAdmin(address,address)":{"notice":"Changes the admin of a proxy contract."},"checkEmergencyStatus(bytes4)":{"notice":"Checks if a specific operation is allowed based on the current emergency status."},"emergencyController()":{"notice":"The central controller for system-wide emergency states."},"emergencyShutdown(uint8)":{"notice":"A function to be called by the EmergencyController to trigger a state change in the contract."},"executeUpgrade(address)":{"notice":"Executes a pending upgrade proposal for a proxy after the timelock has passed."},"getEmergencyController()":{"notice":"Returns the address of the EmergencyController managing this contract."},"getImplementationCount()":{"notice":"Gets the current count of allowlisted implementation addresses."},"getProxyAdmin(address)":{"notice":"Gets the current admin address for a given proxy."},"getProxyImplementation(address)":{"notice":"Gets the current implementation address for a given proxy."},"getUpgradeProposal(address)":{"notice":"Retrieves details about a pending upgrade proposal for a proxy."},"implementationCount()":{"notice":"The total count of approved implementations. If 0, the approval check is bypassed."},"initialize(address,address,uint256,address)":{"notice":"Initializes the ProxyAdmin contract."},"isEmergencyPaused()":{"notice":"Checks if the contract is effectively paused, either locally or by the global EmergencyController."},"proposeUpgrade(address,address)":{"notice":"Proposes a simple upgrade for a proxy to a new implementation."},"proposeUpgradeAndCall(address,address,bytes)":{"notice":"Proposes an upgrade for a proxy that also calls an initialization function on the new implementation."},"removeValidImplementation(address)":{"notice":"Removes an implementation contract address from the allowlist."},"setEmergencyController(address)":{"notice":"Sets or updates the address of the EmergencyController."},"updateTimelock(uint256)":{"notice":"Updates the timelock duration for all future upgrade proposals."},"upgradeProposals(address)":{"notice":"A mapping from a proxy address to its pending upgrade proposal."},"upgradeTimelock()":{"notice":"The duration in seconds that must pass after a proposal before it can be params.implementationToAdd: The address of the implementation contract to add.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

cancelUpgrade(address).details: Can be called by the original proposer or any account with `UPGRADER_ROLE` or `PROXY_ADMIN_ROLE`.

params.proxy: The address of the proxy whose upgrade proposal should be cancelled.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

changeProxyAdmin(address,address).details: This should be used with extreme caution, as it transfers control of the proxy away from this ProxyAdmin. Only callable by an account with the `PROXY_ADMIN_ROLE`.

params.newAdmin: The address of the new admin.
params.proxy: The address of the proxy contract.

checkEmergencyStatus(bytes4).details: This function is typically called by modifiers within the implementing contract to guard functions.

params.operation: The 4-byte function selector of the operation being attempted.

returns.finalOperationAllowed: A boolean indicating if the operation is permitted.

constructor.details: Disables the regular constructor to make the contract upgradeable.

emergencyShutdown(uint8).details: The implementing contract defines how it should react to different emergency levels. For example, it might pause itself or enable emergency withdrawals.

params.emergencyLevel: The system-wide emergency level being broadcast by the controller.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the shutdown was handled successfully.

params.proxy: The address of the proxy to upgrade.

returns.countValue: The number of implementations on the allowlist.

params.proxy: The address of the proxy contract.

returns.adminAddress: The address of the admin (should be this contract).

params.proxy: The address of the proxy contract.

returns.implementationAddress: The address of the logic contract.

returns.canExecOut: A boolean indicating if the proposal can be executed now.
returns.implOut: The address of the proposed new implementation.
returns.timeRemOut: The remaining time in seconds until the timelock expires.
returns.verifiedOut: A boolean indicating if the implementation was on the allowlist at proposal time.

initialize(address,address,uint256,addre.details: Sets up initial contract addresses and the upgrade timelock. Can only be called once.

params.accessControlAddress_: The address of the AccessControl contract.
params.emergencyControllerAddress_: The address of the EmergencyController contract.
params.initialAdmin_: The address to be granted the initial PROXY_ADMIN_ROLE.
params.timelockDuration_: The initial timelock duration for upgrades, in seconds.

returns.isEffectivelyPaused: A boolean indicating if the contract is considered to be in a paused state.

proposeUpgrade(address,address).details: Creates a timelocked proposal. If an implementation allowlist is active, the target must be on it.

params.newImplementationProposed: The address of the new implementation contract.
params.proxy: The address of the proxy to upgrade.

proposeUpgradeAndCall(address,address,by.details: Creates a timelocked proposal. `data` typically contains the function selector and arguments for an initializer.

params.data: The calldata to be executed in the context of the proxy after the upgrade.
params.newImplementationProposed: The address of the new implementation contract.
params.proxy: The address of the proxy to upgrade.

params.implementationToRemove: The address of the implementation contract to remove.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

setEmergencyController(address).details: Only callable by an account with the `PROXY_ADMIN_ROLE`.

params.controller: The address of the new EmergencyController.

returns.successFlag: A boolean indicating if the operation was successful.

updateTimelock(uint256).details: Only callable by an account with the `PROXY_ADMIN_ROLE`.

params.newTimelock: The new timelock duration in seconds.

accessControl().notice: The contract that controls roles and permissions.

addValidImplementation(address).notice: Adds an implementation contract address to the allowlist of valid upgrade targets.

cancelUpgrade(address).notice: Cancels a pending upgrade proposal for a proxy.

changeProxyAdmin(address,address).notice: Changes the admin of a proxy contract.

checkEmergencyStatus(bytes4).notice: Checks if a specific operation is allowed based on the current emergency status.

emergencyController().notice: The central controller for system-wide emergency states.

emergencyShutdown(uint8).notice: A function to be called by the EmergencyController to trigger a state change in the contract.

executeUpgrade(address).notice: Executes a pending upgrade proposal for a proxy after the timelock has passed.

getEmergencyController().notice: Returns the address of the EmergencyController managing this contract.

getImplementationCount().notice: Gets the current count of allowlisted implementation addresses.

getProxyAdmin(address).notice: Gets the current admin address for a given proxy.

getProxyImplementation(address).notice: Gets the current implementation address for a given proxy.

getUpgradeProposal(address).notice: Retrieves details about a pending upgrade proposal for a proxy.

implementationCount().notice: The total count of approved implementations. If 0, the approval check is bypassed.

isEmergencyPaused().notice: Checks if the contract is effectively paused, either locally or by the global EmergencyController.

proposeUpgrade(address,address).notice: Proposes a simple upgrade for a proxy to a new implementation.

proposeUpgradeAndCall(address,address,by.notice: Proposes an upgrade for a proxy that also calls an initialization function on the new implementation.

removeValidImplementation(address).notice: Removes an implementation contract address from the allowlist.

setEmergencyController(address).notice: Sets or updates the address of the EmergencyController.

updateTimelock(uint256).notice: Updates the timelock duration for all future upgrade proposals.

upgradeProposals(address).notice: A mapping from a proxy address to its pending upgrade proposal.

upgradeTimelock().notice: The duration in seconds that must pass after a proposal before it can be executed.

validImplementations(address).notice: A mapping of implementation addresses that are approved for upgrades.
